availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Blakey (Logan County, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. McClean Blakey on February 14, 1844. Father of Susan Blakey, William Blakey, George D. Blakey, and Mary L. Blakey. Farmer in Logan County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Logan County in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860. Sheriff in Logan County in 1863. Sheriff in Logan County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), Film # 000364550, Logan County, 1818-1867, p. 308 of microfilm.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 130A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 26 of microfilm.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 20.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 389B, 390A.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 153.
KYR-0002-022-0101
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Gordonsville, p. 367A.
Find A Grave, "George Thomas Blakey (1822-1914)," Memorial #95467766, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/95467766 (accessed December 3, 2018).
